description: Read small to medium `*.xlsx` files in a browser or Node.js. Parse to JSON with a strict schema.

name: read-excel-file

scripts.test-travis: istanbul cover -x "commonjs/**" -x "modules/**" -x "*.test.js" node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --compilers js:babel-core/register --colors --reporter spec --require ./test/setup.js "./{,!(node_modules|commonjs|modules)/**/}*.test.js" --recursive
